# Wychwood Partners

Wychwood Partners provides Operating Partner and Fractional COO support for growth-stage and private equity-backed businesses.

## What we do
- Install an operating system (decision rights, metrics, execution cadence)
- Improve forecasting and capital planning (cash visibility, scenario triggers, capital discipline)
- Build leadership execution cadence (meeting hygiene, accountability loops)
- Support post-acquisition integration and performance stabilisation

## Who we serve
- Private equity investors and boards
- Founders scaling beyond founder-led execution
- Leadership teams needing tighter performance control
